description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Nachi MZ07 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Nachi MZ07 manipulators. This currently includes the Nachi MZ07-001 and MZ07L-001.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in datasheet MMZEN-265-015_MZ07_MZ03EL-MZ10-01_-11_CFD_FD, version 15th edition. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
